results.title: Wilber
results.creator_credit: Laura Hunter and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
A spooky story of trickery and revenge, where good overcomes evil. Uses claymation and computer animation.
Graduate work from an AIM (Centre for Animation and Interactive Media) RMIT graduate, 2006.

results.title: Wigglemen tales: good goodies
results.creator_credit: Charlie O. Hayward and Stephen Bosustow Productions
results.brief_description: An animated film which demonstrates the effect of advertising and the power of words on the businessman and the consumer. Tells the story of two trucks selling “goodies” as they compete with each other for customers by erecting more and more advertising atop their trucks.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Charlie O. Hayward and Stephen Bosustow Productions

results.title: Widows
results.brief_description: The widows of three men killed while trying to steal a famous painting, join forces to find their husband’s killers and finish off the job of stealing the painting.
results.description: The widows of three men killed while trying to steal a famous painting, join forces to find their husband’s killers and finish off the job of stealing the painting.
description_for_label: The widows of three men killed while trying to steal a famous painting, join forces to find their husband’s killers and finish off the job of stealing the painting.

results.title: Widows
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2018
results.brief_description: A police shootout leaves four thieves dead during an explosive armed robbery attempt in Chicago. Their widows have nothing in common except a debt left behind by their spouses’ criminal activities. Hoping to forge a future on their own terms, they join forces to pull off a heist.

constellations_other.name: Women, crime and literature
constellations_other.description: Judy & Punch draws on a classic puppet show that's been reframed by director Mirrah Foulkes as a feminist tale, much like the works that put women at the centre in this Constellation.

results.title: Widows
results.brief_description: Widows was a British primetime television serial aired in 1983, produced by Euston Films for Thames Television and aired on the ITV network. The six-part series revolved was written by crime writer Lynda La Plante.

constellations_other.name: Women, crime and literature
constellations_other.description: Judy & Punch draws on a classic puppet show that's been reframed by director Mirrah Foulkes as a feminist tale, much like the works that put women at the centre in this Constellation.

results.description:
Widows was a British primetime television serial aired in 1983, produced by Euston Films for Thames Television and aired on the ITV network.

The six-part series revolved was written by crime writer Lynda La Plante. The executive producer was Verity Lambert.

The haunting music that was heard at intervals throughout series 1 and in the final credits of Widows 2, is “What Is Life to Me Without Thee” from the opera L’Orfeo, sung here by Kathleen Ferrier.
description_for_label:
Widows was a British primetime television serial aired in 1983, produced by Euston Films for Thames Television and aired on the ITV network.

The six-part series revolved was written by crime writer Lynda La Plante. The executive producer was Verity Lambert.

The haunting music that was heard at intervals throughout series 1 and in the final credits of Widows 2, is “What Is Life to Me Without Thee” from the opera L’Orfeo, sung here by Kathleen Ferrier.

results.title: Wide pastures
results.creator_credit: Robert Kingsbury, Eric Thompson and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description: Australia’s most enduring industry is the development, breeding and grazing of the Australian merino sheep. A pastoral revolution based on land clearing, top-dressing and irrigation is increasing sheep production over vast new areas, but the traditional outback has hardly changed since farmers went inland to find sheep country.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Robert Kingsbury, Eric Thompson and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.description: Australia’s most enduring industry is the development, breeding and grazing of the Australian merino sheep. results.title: Wicked, Wicked
results.brief_description: A tongue-in-cheek psycho movie in “Duo-vision.” The entire feature employs the split-screen technique used in parts of Brian De Palma’s Sisters that same year.

constellations_other.name: Lois Weber and the split-screen
constellations_other.description: Lois Weber was the third filmmaker to use split screens to show simultaneous action, helping establish it as part of cinematic language, particularly its use in thrillers. It's since been taken to extremes by auteurs and videogames.

results.description: A tongue-in-cheek psycho movie in “Duo-vision.” The entire feature employs the split-screen technique used in parts of Brian De Palma’s “Sisters” that same year. As a handyman at a seacoast hotel, Randolph Roberts wears a monster mask while he kills and dismembers women with blond hair. Tiffany Bolling is a singer, Scott Brady is a detective and Edd “Kookie” Burns is a lifeguard. The music is the original organ score for the silent film “Phantom of the Opera.”
description_for_label: A tongue-in-cheek psycho movie in “Duo-vision.” The entire feature employs the split-screen technique used in parts of Brian De Palma’s “Sisters” that same year. As a handyman at a seacoast hotel, Randolph Roberts wears a monster mask while he kills and dismembers women with blond hair. Tiffany Bolling is a singer, Scott Brady is a detective and Edd “Kookie” Burns is a lifeguard. The music is the original organ score for the silent film “Phantom of the Opera.”

results.title: Wicked city (D)
results.creator_credit: Yoshiaki Kawajiri, Makoto Sedani, Kenji Karada and Manga Entertainment
results.brief_description: The treaty between humans and demons which has existed for centuries is due for renewal. The treaty is needed to prevent the world from plunging into chaos and destruction. Terrorists from both sides use the opportunity to sabotage the agreement so that they may reign supreme.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Yoshiaki Kawajiri, Makoto Sedani, Kenji Karada and Manga Entertainment

results.title: Whyspers
results.brief_description: Massive bronze heads atop towers of crumbling stone communicate via small grey servants. One day a thousand years later a visitor interrupts a conversation. A chinese whispers style mutation occurs as a result.
results.description: Massive bronze heads atop towers of crumbling stone communicate via small grey servants. One day a thousand years later a visitor interrupts a conversation. A chinese whispers style mutation occurs as a result.
